Real-time data integration platform

StreamDuo is a platform for B2B data integration.


Connect back-end systems and stream data with your partners in real-time, using simple APIs

Try it for Free

Streaming

Stream data in real-time, for seamless integration that's wildly easier than hosting an API.

Simple

We do the API hosting, allowing you to use simple APIs to start exchanging data in minutes.

Secure

Granular management of users and authentication gives you complete control over data access.

Talk to Someone

Discover what StreamDuo can do for your data integrations.

How it Works

With StreamDuo you write records to a private stream using simple APIs. Once you grant access to your partners, they read records using flexible APIs to fit any use case.


Streams can be used as..

A Real-Time Data Stream

Poll for unread records in real-time, seeing new events in an instant.



A Replacement for API Hosting

Read individual records like a traditional API.
